text: This chapter shall apply to licensed insurers either domiciled in the District of Columbia or domiciled in a state that is not an accredited state having in effect a substantially similar law. All provisions of Chapter 7 of this title, to the extent they are not superseded by this chapter, shall continue to apply to all parties within holding company systems subject to this chapter.
